11.25.18  6:45 am   have you considered light?

     yes

11.25.18  6:33 am   What exactly the difference between mixing and mastering?

     mixing is when you still have the instruments separately. mastering is just whatever you can do with the 1 final audio file. like put an underwater bubble effect on the whole song. that would be mastering. if you wanna put an underwater bubble effect on just 1 instrument, that would be the mixing person's job

11.25.18  3:07 am   are you blacking out right now

     i was going to say no, but now that i think about it, yes

     maybe 2000 years ago

11.24.18  11:19 pm   Really enjoyed your two history videos. How long does each one take?

     3 months, or 11 months, depending on which one it is

11.24.18  9:06 pm   how's your hand writing?  

     pretty good

     no

     If not, what should i do instead?

     keep me updated on who doesn't like it

11.24.18  6:16 pm   Can we get to know more about you or the universe through your songs?

     yes

11.24.18  5:15 pm   what is the meaaning behind the paintings you relate to in the piece "long long long journey"?

     to see which ones you relate to

11.24.18  4:45 pm   when does it happen?

     now and then

11.24.18  1:17 pm   why do your songs come out on "bill wurtz - topic" before your own channel

     because that is when it hits the music stores, which has to be at midnight in the viewer's time zone. which is not when i prefer to upload the video

11.24.18  1:09 pm   I wish you posted a video everyday

     for that to be possible they would need to be very short. i used to do that, but many people wished the videos were longer. this is one of the classic hardships of the time space continuum

11.24.18  10:59 am   Hey bill if you could be any kind of mythological creature, what kind would you be?

     a person

11.24.18  10:50 am   A while ago you answered a question about music theory and said that it's often conflated with literacy. Can you explain what you mean by literacy?

     just knowing the names of the notes, knowing chord symbols, how to read and write, etc.

11.24.18  10:15 am   i have this one song that's melody begins with a G and i love that song and play it time from time, it's engrained in my brain. i know exactly what a G sounds like because of the song  and i can hum a G anytime. Can i do this for other notes?

     sure. but here's another challenge for you. try to recall the G while listening to any other song which you don't know the key of yet

      i didn't exclusively try to learn this, it happened by itself.

11.24.18  9:07 am   Is Christmas real?

     something is, around that time, that's for sure

11.24.18  8:20 am   is there a place to get your songs in flac form? i am a fan of high fidelity (yes im a pretentious twat)

     the highest quality version would probably be on itunes

11.24.18  7:37 am   a question, what do you think is the point of the human race being alive and ruling the planet?

     keep making cooler points

11.24.18  6:51 am   you are one of the most original person i've ever seen (especially on youtube)

so i'm asking you: how do i find my own style? how did you find your own style?

     style is everywhere. it is raining style. it's almost like the plauge, but instead of disease and death, ..... style

11.24.18  6:25 am   Why do you create and what do you think your art is about?

     i am analyzing the world i live in

11.24.18  3:22 am   i just thought of an idea. next time i am habing trouble deciding something with multiple options i will think of the first things that pop into my head and then decide between the two. and only if both the ideas are REALLY bad will i consider considering another option.

     seems legit

11.24.18  3:16 am   what are bees?

     the female equivalent of a bird

11.24.18  2:08 am   this week i've arranged a designated crying period, in which i sit in my room for a while and cry until i feel better.  do you have any unusual methods of venting,

     talking about it

      if so, what are some things that trouble you?

     how many different sizes shapes can be

11.24.18  12:22 am   who will invent the first thing inventor?

     you

11.24.18  12:19 am   what makes a question enjoyable

     it is nearly impossible to predict enjoyability

11.23.18  11:28 pm   Hmmm is there any particular reason why some people use Cb to refer to B or E# to refer to F? Coz I've seen this in a couple places (mainly Synthesia)

     it's not some people, it's some situations. if you are in the key of Gb, there is the B note but if you call it B then you have Gb, Ab, Bb, B, Db, Eb. this gets real messy if you try to put it on the staff. to use a key signature on a staff you just flat everything you need and then play the scale, with all the letters laid out. so you can't have 2 B notes, you'd have to keep flatting and sharping it. the same would be true for E#, which would be the last note the key of F# major. if you called if F it would be a mess when you write on the staff, you'd have to keep sharping and unsharping the F

11.23.18  10:57 pm   How do you remain yourself for the holidays?

     do my own holidays

11.23.18  10:57 pm   what is your opinion on colored pencils?

     they are very good

11.23.18  10:54 pm   do you draw/are you a visual artist too?

     yes

     1

     0 or 1

     at least once

     different than what

11.23.18  9:10 pm   are you even the real bill, or has he been kidnapped? i've been noticing a lot of capital letters in your song titles, and i know that's something you'd never do... tell me!

     perhaps i was kidnapped before

11.23.18  8:50 pm   charisma is sold but it's also available for free. is that right?

     i don't think it's sellable. but it can be used to sell other things. wait no i just realized it can be sold, via clothing and accessories. that's not the whole picture but i will admit that can give anyone a slight boost sometimes

11.23.18  8:31 pm   I think I might have turned myself into a tree. What now?

     turn yourself into something else

11.23.18  7:54 pm   Why can't I just get things done without a deadline

     because there are infinite ways to do it and you can't decide

11.23.18  6:51 pm   how do you make your first music video?

     i think i just put the lyric in 2 colors and made it switch back and forth, and then i might have done a drawing at the end, where i drew the drawing and erased it 1 bit at a time in reverse order i drew it, screen shotting with each bit. unless the first music video was the live action one, in which case i acted out each instrument in sync with the song

     a new year

11.23.18  5:32 pm   Are you normally this humorous or just online?

     i try to keep a professional attitude, both on and off line

     going back and forth between happy and sad

     my mother thinks your question is stupid. how do you feel about that

      go snorkling and record the audio using a water proof microphone
